name: ##Zombies Gemini
author: Jiyose
notes: Finally I have got this deck to work. Past seasons I've tried to reach KOG with this one (my precious) but I couldn't. It's good against everything but Hazy Flame because of the Beast Rising. I still think this deck can be optimized, and I hope you guys help me optimizing it. Maybe when Bonz comes out it will shine. Thank you.
